description: Data was extracted from GDC legacy archive on February 2017. microRNA isoform expression data was generated using Illumina GA or HiSeq sequencing platforms. This table has been deprecated. It has been copied to isb-cgc-bq.TCGA_versioned.miRNAseq_isoform_hg19_gdc_2017_02. Please see isb-cgc-bq.TCGA.miRNAseq_isoform_hg19_gdc_current for the most current table.
friendlyName: TCGA HG19 MIRNASEQ ISOFORM EXPRESSION 2017 DEPRECATED

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089  --  note that each case typically has a primary-tumor sample and a matched-normal (blood or adjacent tissue) sample; please refer to the TCGA Biospecimen table for more details
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Original TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: Original TCGA aliquot barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
fields.name: aliquot_barcode

fields.description: One of 1788 unique miRNA ids (aka symbols) contained in this table, eg hsa-mir-21
fields.name: mirna_id

fields.description: One of 2459 unique mature miRNA accession id (eg MIMAT0000062) -- note that this can also be null, in the event that this read does not map to a mature portion of the miRNA
fields.name: mirna_accession

fields.description: Indicates the type of transcript -- either mature, precursor, unannotated, or stemloop  (if this value is not mature, then the mirna_accession field will be null)
fields.name: mirna_transcript

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
fields.name: chromosome

fields.description: Either + or - to denote whether read mapped to the sense (+) or anti-sense (-) strand
fields.name: strand

fields.description: Number of reads that were mapped to this mirna_id
fields.name: read_count

fields.description: Read count normalized by total reads mapped divided by 1 million
fields.name: reads_per_million_miRNA_mapped

fields.description: A short isomiR read may map exactly to mature strands whose sequences are similar but not identical, when the read sequence does not capture the bases that distinguish these miRNAs (e.g. hsa-mir-30a at 6q13 and hsa-mir-30e at 1p34.2, which differ at position 18). We report such a <line_feed> read as cross-mapped, and we increment the read count for each MIMAT that it mapped to. Either Y or N -- fewer than 2% are Y
fields.name: cross_mapped

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode)  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba18
fields.name: file_gdc_id

fields.description: GDC unique identifier for this case (corresponds to the case_barcode), eg 6d10d4ee-6331-4bba-93bc-a7b64cc0b22a  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this:   https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/cases/6d10d4ee-6331-4bba-93bc-a7b64cc0b22a
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this aliquot (corresponds to the aliquot_barcode), eg 7fbfdb3e-1fd2-4206-8d2e-7f68e4a15844  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: aliquot_gdc_id
